column1: * 1957 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter to Michael George Tolkien (24 April 1957).
* 1962 - Author and editor Henry Gee is born.
* 2007 - The Lord of the Rings Online: Shadows of Angmar is released.
* 2008 - Guillermo del Toro is officially announced as the director of The Hobbit (film series) film adaptation and its sequel.
* 2008 - The Lord of the Rings Online: The Lord of the Rings Online: Shadows of Angmar
column2: "Doom of the Last-King" is released in North America.

column1: * 2014 - Peter Jackson announces that the third The Hobbit (film series) is to be renamed from There and Back Again to The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies.
:There are no known events for this day.Category:Datesfi:24. huhtikuuta
